ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Frequency of Page Visits
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix does its best to avoid re-crawling pages it has already seen. It keeps a list of URLs that it has seen and checks it every time it sees a new URL.

Heritrix does its best to avoid re-crawling pages it has already seen. 
It keeps a list of URLs that it has seen and checks it every time it 
sees a new URL.  There's a URL canonicalization routine that Heritrix 
passes URLs through that aids in this process. See

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/config.html#urlcanon

for more info.

Regards,
Frank

> visit the page X 1 time or 3 times?
